oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Guitar Man; Jerry Reed tribute - 2012-05-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance honoring songwriter, guitar player and singer Jerry Reed from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 5, 2012. Guests include Thom Bresh; Craig Dobbins; John Knowles; Richard Smith; Mark Thornton; Darrell Toney; Sean Weaver. Band includes Steve Bryant; Ric McClure; Will Barrow.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Thom Bresh; Craig Dobbins; John Knowles; Richard Smith; Mark Thornton; Darrell Tone; Sean Weaver; Sedina Reed;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program host is Richard Smith. Performances include; Blue Finger (John Knowles); Struttin' (John Knowles); America The Beautiful (Mark Thornton); Little Jerry (Mark Thornton); Reedology (Sean Weaver); The City Of New Orleans (Craig Dobbins); Picky, Picky, Picky (Craig Dobbins); Don't Think Twice, It's Alright (Darrell Toney); Talk About The Good Times (Darrell Toney); Almost Crazy (Sedina Reed); The Mad Russia (Richard Smith); A Thing Called Love (Richard Smith with Julie Adams); Swingin' 69 (Richard Smith); Squirrely (Richard Smith); Georgia (Richard Smith); Good Friends And Neighbors (Thom Bresh); Reed Between The Strings (Thom Bresh); Amos Moses/When You're Hot, You're Hot (Thom Bresh); Guitar Man (Richard Smith and all);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Reed, Jerry; Bresh, Thom; Dobbins, Craig; Knowles, John; Smith, Richard; Thornton, Mark; Toney, Darrell; Weaver, Sean; Reed, Sedina; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
